title: Number of Papa John 's restaurants worldwide 2007 to 2018
summary: In general Number of restaurants has rose over the Year.
Number of restaurants is slightly increasing from 2013 to 2014.
The most drastic increase took place within the Year 2013 and 2014.
Maximum Number of restaurants, about 4663.0 was reported at Year 2014
The lowest Number of restaurants, of value 4428.0 was reported at Year 2013
